page.title: 16Collecting Toy Soldiers.
page.content: I started collecting soldiers in 1984. This started when my Grandmar came overfrom Austrailia.When she arrived she took us to the shops,we had a look around and l chose an army vehicle and seven German soldiers and my brother chose seven British soldiers they cost twenty pence each.Then everyone went to the shop later and we bought four soldiers.Soon Jamie my brother stopped collecting soldiers and he gave his soldiers to me.I discovered a different shop in crewe called poundstrechers.The soldiers were cheaper but they were plastic.They were better though because they had jeeps,tanks,cannons and ambulances. They cost fifty pence per bag each bag contains about twenty soilders.Then my dad built me a fort out of wood and l play with my solders in it.
